name: Hark Standing Mirror – Marble/Brass
description: A mirror solving all your storage and space issues; the Hark features secret shelves, an umbrella stand and four hooks on the back of its frame, perfect for hanging beauty products and dressing gowns alike. The shelf is made from marble and the frame has a matte bronze finish, with polished ends on the hanging hooks. The back of the mirror is also covered in a soft fabric. Its design has a heavy retro influence with its arch-like shape.
